thread.title: Wakaso to miss Las Palmas clash with Villareal
thread.title_full: Wakaso to miss Las Palmas clash with Villareal

title: Wakaso to miss Las Palmas clash with Villareal
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 08:25 CET Wakaso to miss Las Palmas clash with Villareal - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Combatant Black Stars midfielder, Mubarak Wakaso will miss Las Palmas clash with Villareal in the Spanish La Liga on Sunday, the clubs website has confirmed. 
The influential midfielder has been instrumental for the Spanish outfit since the beginning of the season but will be out of the weekend’s clash due to the accumulation of cards. 
Wakaso, 25, picked a yellow card in the side’s clash with Getafe last week, taking his tally to three which means he will not be available for the clash with Villareal. 
The former AshantiGold defender picked his first yellow of the season against champions Barcelona and followed it up with another in the 2-0 defeat to Eibar at home. 
The Ghanaian has displayed a very combative attitude in midfield for the Los Amarillos after joining them from Scottish champions Celtic. 
Wakaso has been in blistering form for Las Palmas but will be out for the first time since making his debut for The Yellows a months ago. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us A man can only be carefull until he buys a new car and a white shirt. By: Obidee Aba
